name: bee-script
description: Knex.js powered CLI for running scripts
author: Stefan Woskowiak

scripts.initDB: docker run -d --name beeDB --restart unless-stopped -e POSTGRES_USER=queenBee -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=beeTheChangeYouWantToSeeInTheWorld -e POSTGRES_DB=beeScripts -e POSTGRES_HOST_AUTH_METHOD=trust -p 32777:5432 postgres:11
